page.title: 15WOODBURY
page.content: 84% of people had televisions, 87% of people had radios/hi.fi's.16% had a video recorder , 13% had a microwave oven , 10% had a microcomputer. Housing : modern 32%, cottage 26%, traditional 6%, Georgian/ Victorian or Devon longhouse 3%. Majority of houses were brick built and detached.The heating used is mainly Oil (35%) , Solid Fuel (35%) or Electric (23%) central heating. The majority of people have lived in the area for over 5 years. Most clubs in the area are sporting clubs and there are several societies that meet in the area Most people do not shop locally but prefer to travel to Exeter or Exmouth. The total no. of replies to the questionnaire was 31 out of 150 sent out.
